s8.message: Fixed: Tooltip appears on items in the toolbar icon's menu

s3.message: Filters starting with http:// or https:// no longer match only at the beginning of the address

s2.message: Fixed file permission problems when installing on Linux in Mozilla Suite/SeaMonkey

s1.message: Added translations: Danish, British English, Portuguese, Swedish, Chinese Traditional

s7.message: Maximal compatible Netscape version set to Netscape 8.1

s6.message: Detached sidebar now has a close button on Mac OS X

s5.message: Allowed adding filters even with a write-protected profile

s4.message: Starting filters with | makes them match only at the beginning of the address, finishing them with | makes them match only at the end
